mapper.select:
SELECT sg.id, sg.gcId,sg.goodsName,sg.goodsSubtitle,sg.goodsImageMore, sg.brandId,sg.goodsClick, sg.saleNum, sz.specGoodsPrice, sg.merchantId FROM shop_goods sg LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,goodsId,specName,specNameValue,specGoodsPrice,specGoodsStorage,specGoodsSerial,specIsOpen,specStorageWarning FROM shop_goods_spec a, (SELECT MIN(specGoodsPrice) AS price,goodsId as groupId FROM shop_goods_spec AS sgs WHERE sgs.specIsOpen = 1 GROUP BY goodsId) b where a.goodsId = b.groupId and specGoodsPrice = price GROUP BY goodsId) sz ON sg.id = sz.goodsId WHERE 1=1 and sg.goodsShow = 1
and sg.id = #{goodsId}

SELECT g.id, g.gcId,g.goodsName,g.goodsSubtitle,g.goodsImageMore,g.brandId,g.goodsClick, g.saleNum, g.specGoodsPrice,a.activityId,a.activitySTime, a.activityETime, a.activityGoodsId,a.activityPrice,a.peopleCount,a.activityType
, a.startTime, a.endTime
FROM (SELECT sg.id, sg.gcId,sg.goodsName,sg.goodsSubtitle,sg.goodsImageMore,sg.brandId,sg.goodsClick, sg.saleNum, sz.specGoodsPrice FROM shop_goods sg LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,goodsId,specName,specNameValue,specGoodsPrice,specGoodsStorage,specGoodsSerial,specIsOpen,specStorageWarning FROM shop_goods_spec a, (SELECT MIN(specGoodsPrice) AS price,goodsId as groupId FROM shop_goods_spec AS sgs WHERE sgs.specIsOpen = 1 GROUP BY goodsId) b where a.goodsId = b.groupId and specGoodsPrice = price GROUP BY goodsId) sz ON sg.id = sz.goodsId WHERE 1=1 and sg.goodsShow = 1) g, (select sag.goodsId, sa.startTime as activitySTime, sa.endTime as activityETime, sag.activityId,sag.id as activityGoodsId,sag.activityPrice,sag.peopleCount,sag.activityType
, sat.startTime, sat.endTime
from shop_activity sa,shop_activity_goods sag
, shop_activity_time sat
where sa.id = sag.activityId
and sag.activitytimeId = sat.id
and sa.status = 1 and NOW() >= sa.startTime and NOW() <= sa.endTime
and sat.timeTempId = #{timeTempId}
) as a where g.id = a.goodsId
and a.activityId = #{activityId}

select a.goodsId as id,a.startTime as activitySTime,a.endTime as activityETime,a.activityId, a.activityGoodsId, a.activityPrice, a.peopleCount, a.activityType, sat.startTime, sat.endTime from (select sa.startTime,sa.endTime,sag.goodsId, sag.activityId,sag.id as activityGoodsId, sag.activityPrice, sag.peopleCount,sag.activityType,sag.activityTimeId from shop_activity sa, shop_activity_goods sag where sa.id = sag.activityId and NOW() >= sa.startTime and NOW() <= sa.endTime) a LEFT JOIN shop_activity_time sat ON sat.id = a.activityTimeId where 1=1
and a.goodsId = #{goodsId}
